title: Ep 15: Schrodinger Scat
description:
Today's Proceedings:  We receive an unbiased review of the show from a listener. A man accidentally makes a fool of himself in the grocery store while possible destroying a marriage in the process. A woman awakes from a nap only to be in a living nightmare. We discuss a listener's submission to  the proper etiquette for wiping ones ass. And finally a fiance is stuck having to go along with an nontraditional family tradition if he plans to get married.

Rate and Review our podcast and share it with your friends!

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod

Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod

Music by: James Young

https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg

Logo/Designs by:

https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support
